abstract: Update: First Data has officially closed its $26 billion buyout by K.K.R. Michael D. Capellas, the former chief executive of Compaq, will replace Henry Duques as chairman and C.E.O., among other personnel changes.First Data appears to be right on time.
lead_paragraph: Update: First Data has officially closed its $26 billion buyout by K.K.R. Michael D. Capellas, the former chief executive of Compaq, will replace Henry Duques as chairman and C.E.O., among other personnel changes.First Data appears to be right on time.
